    public class AbstractLazyDataModel<T extends Serializable>

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public List<T> load(int firstIndex,
                    int pageSize,
                    String sortField,
                    org.primefaces.model.SortOrder sortOrder,
                    Map<String,Object> filters)
        Load a paginated list of elements.

        Get the current predicates and orders, then add pagination and datatable filter and sorting.

        For filtering, the field name doesn't contains the object name on with EL expression will be resolved. For example if the EL expression in xHTML is "#{right.code}", so the field name will be "code".

        Overrides:
        load in class org.primefaces.model.LazyDataModel<T extends Serializable>
        Parameters:
        firstIndex - Index of first element in current page to load.
        Filter element (first page, first row) has an index of 0.
        pageSize - The number of result per page.
        sortField - The field name on which filter.
        Default: null.
        sortOrder - The order of sort.
        Default: SortOrder.ASCENDING.
        filters - Association of field names to value set by user to filter results.
        Default: an empty Map.
        See Also:
        AbstractService.findAll(Predicate, Pageable)
